name: Sacrifice (itch) (Juan%Percent)
description:
My submission for the GJL Game Parade Fall 2021. Sacrifice is a game where the player must clear floors of zombies in order to descend to the depths of the dungeon. After every floor, the player must sacrifice something they have in order to progress.

All Assets except audio were created by myself.
